DataElement.preferredName: Sex Behavior Female Past Integer::6 Month Assessment Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: an event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation for yes, no and I prefer not to answer responses related to sexual behavior is a form of physical intimacy that can be directed to reproduction (one possible goal of sexual intercourse) and/or to enjoying the body of someone else; activities associated with sexual intercourse with a person who belongs to the sex that normally produces ova in the past 6 months.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Sex Behavior Female Past Integer::6 Month Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to sexual behavior is a form of physical intimacy that can be directed to reproduction (one possible goal of sexual intercourse) and/or to enjoying the body of someone else; activities associated with sexual intercourse with a person who belongs to the sex that normally produces ova in the past 6 months.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Sexual behavior is a form of physical intimacy that can be directed to reproduction (one possible goal of sexual intercourse) and/or to enjoying the body of someone else; activities associated with sexual intercourse. (from Wikipedia)

Concepts.definition: Behaviors involved with sexual arousal and/or intercourse.

Property.preferredDefinition: A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces ova. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, or cultural gender role distinctions, or both.:Past; before the present time.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::6:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces ova. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, or cultural gender role distinctions, or both.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
